Steps.StepString: Identified that input sanitization is only implemented on the front end via JavaScript.

Substeps.SubstepString: Identify that input sanitization is only implemented on the front end via JavaScript.

Steps.StepString: Decided to use burpsuite to bypass the front-end input sanitization.

Substeps.SubstepString: Decide to use burpsuite to bypass the front-end input sanitization.

Steps.StepString: Configured and started the burpsuite tool to intercept data between the server and the client.

Substeps.SubstepString: Intercept data between the server and the client.

Steps.StepString: Intercepted the data and manipulated it using burpsuite, thus bypassing the front end input sanitization.

Substeps.SubstepString: Manipulate the intercepted data using burpsuite.
Bypass the front end input sanitization.
